name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Voice Chat Assistant - Add AI voice chat to ChatGPT web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speak your messages and hear responses in near real-time. Say 'over' to send, pause anytime.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üéôÔ∏è Ever wished you could just talk with ChatGPT web? Now you can.

Transform your ChatGPT experience from typing to talking with Voice Chat Assistant. Have natural, flowing conversations with AI - just like talking to a real person.

‚ú® What Makes This Special:
‚Ä¢ Just Talk Naturally - No commands to learn, just speak and say "over"
‚Ä¢ Hear Real Responses - Not robotic voice, but natural, human-like speech
‚Ä¢ Zero Delay - Responses start playing as they're being generated
‚Ä¢ One-Click Toggle - Switch between voice and text instantly
‚Ä¢ Keep Your Hands Free - Perfect for multitasking or cooking

üéØ Perfect For:
‚Ä¢ Brainstorming while walking around
‚Ä¢ Getting answers while cooking or working
‚Ä¢ Learning pronunciations from AI
‚Ä¢ Accessibility needs
‚Ä¢ Anyone who prefers talking over typing

‚ö°Ô∏è Quick Start:
1. Install & click the extension icon
2. Add your free ElevenLabs API key
3. Click the voice chat button on ChatGPT
4. Start talking!

üéÅ Free to Try:
‚Ä¢ Uses ElevenLabs' free tier (10,000 characters/month)

‚Ä¢ No credit card required

üîí Privacy First:

Ready to start talking with ChatGPT? Install now and experience the future of AI interaction.
